original: This mansion has belonged to this family for generations, and although it may not look very impressive, it has all the comforts of home.
translation: 这个庄园世代属于这个家族，它看起来也许平淡无奇，但却具有家的一切舒适。

original: This mansion is impressive enough to command the respect of the surrounding countryside. It is clearly the home of someone important.
translation: 这座威严的官邸赢得了周边乡下人的尊敬。它肯定属于某个大人物。

original: A palace fit for a king, its shining towers can be seen from a league away on a clear day. Though it may only consist of brick and mortar, it is the beating heart of this entire dynasty.
translation: 一座足以配得上国王的宫殿，在晴朗的日子里，从一里外就能看见它闪亮的塔楼，尽管它只是由砖石和灰泥构成，却代表着整个家族跳动的心脏。

original: Truly, the splendor of this palace would be the envy of a Roman emperor. Its great halls shine of gold and marble, and hundreds of servants scurry through them daily in service of their masters. It is nothing less than a monument to the greatness of this dynasty.
translation: 显然，连一位罗马皇帝都会羡慕这宫殿的华丽。大厅里映着黄金和大理石的光芒，数以百计的仆人穿梭在宫殿中服侍他们的主人。它可以说是彰显这个家族伟大的丰碑。

original: The dynasty's household guards are lodged within these simple barracks. They are crowded and unsanitary, but provide decent protection against the elements.
translation: 在这些简陋的营房中暂住着这个家族的私人护卫。他们既拥挤又不卫生，但是提供了足够的防护。

original: An industrious swordsmith has opened up a forge in the palace courtyard. This will make it easier to equip new recruits with weapons.
translation: 一个勤劳的铸剑师在庭院里开辟了一个锻铁炉，这使得武装新兵变得更加容易。

original: A large armory has been constructed in a corner of the palace courtyard. It holds enough weapons and armor to equip a small army at a moment's notice.
translation: 在庭院角落建好了一座庞大的军械库，它存放着足够的武器和盔甲，可以随时武装一小支军队。

original: This small stable just outside the palace walls reeks of hay and manure. It holds the horses of the guard, as well as those of any visitors.
translation: 这座小马厩在墙外散发着干草和马粪的气息，用来安置卫兵和访客的马匹。

original: Several large fields just outside the palace have been graciously "donated" by local farmers and set aside as riding grounds. Here the fighting men can practise the art of war on horseback.
translation: 本地农民友善「捐献」的几块宽广土地被辟为跑马场，这样一来战士们就能够练习马背上的技艺了。

original: A horse breeder has set up shop in the vicinity of the palace. The large pens can hold hundreds of animals, and ensure a steady supply of mounts for forces raised locally.
translation: 一个养马人在宅邸附近开了育马所。这个巨大的养殖场足够安置数以百计的牲口，确保了本地招募骑兵坐骑的稳定供应。

original: A skilled bowyer has set up his small workshop inside the palace courtyard. Here he can make new bows or repair broken ones as needed.
translation: 在宅邸庭院里，一个熟练的制弓人建立了他的小工房，当需要时他能够在这制造和修复弓箭。

original: This target range lets the men practise their archery. There are several targets positioned at different distances, but as yet, no one has managed to split another's arrow.
translation: 这个靶场让人们能在此练习箭术。这里有好几个放置在不同距离的靶子，不过到现在为止，还没人能成功射裂靶上的另一支箭。

original: The crossbow is a marvelous invention. Though it can't be fired as quickly as a longbow, it requires little training to use effectively. This workshop ensures a steady supply of these deadly weapons.
translation: 十字弩是一种奇迹般的发明。尽管它没有长弓那么高的发射频率，但未经训练的新兵也能十分有效地使用它。这个工房保证了这种致命武器的稳定供应。

original: This room inside the palace is a cartographer's dream, and contains priceless maps of all sorts. Some are claimed to date back to the ancient Greeks, and others, whose accuracy cannot be gauged with any certainty, depict strange lands far to the east.
translation: 拥有这样一个房间可以说是每一个制图者的梦想，屋内拥有各类无价的地图，一些甚至能追溯到古希腊，另一些没法确保精度的则描绘了遥远东方的陌生土地。

original: This large shipyard is located along the coast, but it has been reserved for exclusive use by this dynasty. Skilled shipwrights stand ready to build trade galleys.
translation: 这座坐落于海岸的船坞为这个家族提供独家的服务，熟练的工人们时刻准备着为主人建造商船。

original: This naval arsenal is located in the capital, but it is completely owned by this dynasty who has reserved all use of it for themselves. It is a huge complex that has everything needed to assemble and man an entire fleet.
translation: 这座完全被这个家族控制的海军兵工厂坐落于首都，是一个能装配和补充一整支舰队的庞然大物。

original: A large warehouse containing all the supplies necessary to field a military force, whether it be an army or a fleet.
translation: 这座巨大的仓库容纳着的补给品足以满足一整支陆军或舰队的需求。

original: It is easy to get lost in this colossal archive housed entirely within the palace. It holds documents and records of all dynastic assets, from ships and buildings down to individual soldiers and clerks.
translation: 在这样巨大的档案馆中迷路是再寻常不过的事啦。在其中保存着所有关于这个家族资产的档案，大到船只和建筑小至单个卫兵和办事员。

original: This office deep within the palace acts as the nerve center of the entire dynastic empire. Here clerks and officials oversee the day-to-day affairs of trade negotiations and fleet deployments.
translation: 这间办事处位于宅邸深处，是这个家族帝国的神经中枢，在这里理事和办事员审查着每日的贸易谈判和舰队部署事宜。

original: A large and impressive garden filled with the manifold wonders of nature. This tranquil environment is ideal for moments of quiet reflection.
translation: 这个令人侧目的巨大花园里充满里自然的奇迹，在这样宁静的所在静心沉思是多么美妙的事呀。

original: This scenic pond, often frequented by swans, is the centerpiece of the palace garden. A small fountain in its middle sprays water into the air while carps can be glimpsed just beneath the surface.
translation: 这个时常被天鹅占据的景观池是花园的中心。在中央，一个小喷泉将水珠洒向空中，在水面可以瞥见鲤鱼的身影。

original: No self-respecting garden is complete without one. This intricate hedge maze delights visitors, and many dignitaries have spent hours navigating its twisting paths.
translation: 每一个完美花园都缺不了这个，错综复杂的树篱迷宫显然能让访客兴致高昂，许多显贵们会花费好几小时来探索其中曲折蜿蜒的路径。

original: A well-stocked wine cellar is an absolute must for any aristocrat of rank, and this one certainly doesn't disappoint. Some of the wines stored here date back decades.
translation: 一个储备充足的酒窖是每个显贵的必需品，这个同样毫不逊色，其中一些存酒甚至能追溯到几十年前。

original: These catacombs located far beneath the palace contain the dynastic tombs. Here countless generations dating back centuries are joined in eternal slumber. May they rest in peace.
translation: 家族墓地位于宅邸地下深处的陵寝。几个世纪以来的无数代先人在此进入永恒的沉眠。愿他们安息。

original: This vast complex of dungeons is hidden away deep enough below the palace to block the cries of its unfortunate inhabitants. Every imaginable instrument of torture can be found within these cold and dark chambers.
translation: 这个广阔又复杂的地牢隐藏在宅邸的地下深处以隔离那些不幸居民们的哀嚎。任何想象得到的拷打器具都能在这些阴冷黑暗的密室中找到。

original: A secluded shrine hidden away in a quiet wing of the palace. Here men and women can spend their time in prayer and introspective soul-searching.
translation: 一个隐秘的圣堂隐藏在宅邸的一个安静侧厅中，男人女人们能在这儿祈祷和反省深思。

original: This gallery occupies a large chamber in one of the palace wings, and it contains all works of art accumulated by members of this dynasty over the years - from contemporary tapestries to ancient marble sculptures from Greece and Rome.
translation: 这个美术馆位于侧厅一间很大的房间里，它储存着这些年家族成员们收集的艺术品——从同时代的挂毯到罗马希腊时代的大理石雕像。

original: A huge library containing all sorts of dusty old tomes collected and purchased from all over the known world by members of this dynasty. They are in many different languages and no person alive has read them all, but at least here they will be protected for posterity.
translation: 这间大图书馆收藏着各类由家族成员们收集和购买到的古卷。它们由各式各样不同文字撰写，所以没有活人能全部读懂它们，但至少在这里，它们会被妥善保管以供子孙传续。

original: This fortified vault deep within the palace is where the dynasty keeps all of their treasures collected over the years. Only the head of the dynasty has access to the vault keys, but the stories of piles upon piles of golden coins, deep enough for a man to dive around in like a porpoise, or burrow through like a gopher, must surely be false.
translation: 这座位于宅邸深处的加固宝库保存着这些年这个家族收集到的所有珍宝。只有家主才能有权进入，不过那些关于在其中有足以让人像海豚一样在其中潜水或像地鼠一样打洞的堆积如山的金币的故事，想必只是谣言而已。

original: These secret passages run through the entire palace, and enable those in the know to quickly move from one end to the other without being seen. By pulling on the right candelabrum, an unassuming bookshelf or a lit fireplace might slide open. Perfect for escaping would-be assassins or awkward social gatherings.
translation: 这些秘道贯通整个宅邸，足够让那些知情人快速隐秘地从一段前往另一端。通过拉动正确的烛台，某个不起眼的书架或壁炉就会向你敞开。对于用来逃脱追杀和应付群体暴动十分有效。

original: This hidden chamber inside the palace can only be reached through one of the secret passages, and even then several special keys are required. It serves as a well-protected retreat for the head of the dynasty, where he or she can safely plot the conquest of the world without irritating distractions.
translation: 这个位于宅邸内部的暗室只能通过唯一一条正确的秘道到达，同时还需要好几个特殊钥匙来开启。对于家主来说是完美的藏身之处，在这里他或她能在绝对安全中策划征服世界的计划而不受任何事物的干扰。

original: Merchant galleys load and off-load their cargo at this small port.
translation: 商船在这个小港口中装卸它们的货物。

original: Merchant galleys load and off-load their cargo aided by a simple wooden harbor crane at this port.
translation: 在这个港口中，商船在简易木吊车的帮助下装卸着货物。

original: Merchant galleys load and off-load their cargo aided by several wooden harbor cranes at this bustling port.
translation: 在这个忙碌的港口中，商船在简易木吊车的帮助下装卸着货物。

original: This small warehouse houses goods awaiting shipment out to sea or to potential buyers further inland.
translation: 在这个小仓库中的商品等着被运出海或深入内陆，以供应潜在的客户。

original: This warehouse houses goods awaiting shipment out to sea or to potential buyers further inland.
translation: 在这个仓库中的商品等着被运出海或深入内陆，以供应潜在的客户。

original: This large warehouse houses goods awaiting shipment out to sea or to potential buyers further inland.
translation: 在这个大仓库中的商品等着被运出海或深入内陆，以供应潜在的客户。

original: An enclave of expatriates from the republic have established themselves in this foreign land to conduct trade.
translation: 来自共和国的商人在外国的土地上建起了这座商栈，来开展他们的贸易事业。

original: A large enclave of expatriates from the republic have established themselves in this foreign land to conduct trade.
translation: 来自共和国的商人在外国的土地上建起了这座大商栈，来开展他们的贸易事业。

original: A small garrison stands vigil over the trade post to deter bandits and rival trade powers.
translation: 一座警戒贸易站的小守军驻地，足以抵御强盗和贸易对手的入侵。

original: A garrison stands vigil over the trade post to deter bandits and rival trade powers.
translation: 一座警戒贸易站的守军驻地，足以抵御强盗和贸易对手的入侵。

original: A large garrison stands vigil over the trade post to deter bandits and rival trade powers.
translation: 一座警戒贸易站的大守军驻地，足以抵御强盗和贸易对手的入侵。

original: This small fort overlooks the trade post, and its wooden walls constitute the final defense against any attacker.
translation: 这座小堡垒俯瞰着整个贸易站，它的木墙构成了应对袭击者的最后防线。

original: This fort overlooks the trade post, and its stone walls constitute the final defense against any attacker.
translation: 这座堡垒俯瞰着整个贸易站，它的石墙构成了应对袭击者的最后防线。

original: This large fort overlooks the trade post, and its massive stone walls constitute the final defense against any attacker.
translation: 这座大堡垒俯瞰着整个贸易站，它的巨石墙构成了应对袭击者的最后防线。

original: State Inquisitor
translation: 国家检察官

original: The three State Inquisitors are charged with ensuring the security of the Republic against threats both internal and external.
translation: 三个国家检察官负责抵御来自内部和外部的威胁，以确保共和国的安全。

original: High Admiral
translation: 海军上将

original: The High Admiral is formally the chief of the Admiralty and in charge of the Republic's Navy, though he often relies on a competent staff.
translation: 海军上将是首席海军大臣，负责指挥共和国的海军，虽然他时常依赖一位有能力的幕僚为其出谋划策。

original: High Judge
translation: 最高法官

original: The High Judge is the supreme justice of the Republic, who answers only to the Council in most legal matters.
translation: 最高法官是在大部分法律事项上仅需向内阁负责的共和国司法最高官员

original: Money in the Campaign Fund will increase your Respect in the senate and make your candidate more likely to be elected the next $RULER_TITLE$. You can freely adjust the amount until the current $RULER_TITLE$ dies, when the Fund will be used up in the election campaign.

original: §Y$HEIR$§! is widely expected to succeed §Y$RULER$§!. However, there is always a degree of uncertainty in the elections - to make sure of success, you might want to invest more money than the strict minimum in your campaign fund.
translation: §Y$HEIR$§!被广泛认为是§Y$RULER$§!的继承者。但选举总伴随着些许不确定——为了确保成功，你可能需要增加你的竞选经费。

original: With the death of §Y$PATRICIAN$§!, the illustrious House §Y$DYNASTY$§! has become extinct.

original: Patrician Family Rises
translation: 新的共和国家族崛起

original: A new great House has risen to the forefront of $TITLE_ADJ$ politics, under §Y$PATRICIAN$§!.
translation: 一个新的显赫家族在§Y$PATRICIAN$§!的领导下，在$TITLE_ADJ$的政坛冉冉升起。

original: Merchant Republic Election
translation: 商业共和国选举

original: §Y$NEW_DOGE$§! has been elected the new $RULER_TITLE$ of the great Republic of §Y$TITLE$§!

original: Can afford the Bride Price of §Y$DOWRY$§!¤ for marriage with a noblewoman
translation: 可以承担与一名贵族女性结婚的彩礼 §Y$DOWRY$§!¤

original: Marrying a woman as noble as §Y[RecipientExtra.GetFirstName]§! will require a Bride Price of §R$DOWRY$§!¤.

original: Marrying a woman as noble as §Y[RecipientExtra.GetFirstName]§! will require a Bride Price of §R$DOWRY$§!¤.

original: We propose that [ActorExtra.GetBestName] and [RecipientExtra.GetBestName] should get betrothed. Of course, for such a noble Lady, we also offer a Bride Price of $DOWRY$¤

translation: [Actor.GetTitledName]承认你的独立！

original: I release you from your vassalage and will no longer be your liege. [Actor.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] bless your future endeavors!
